name: USD Stable Colb
description: "The USD Stablecolb (or ""SCB"") is a USD-backed ERC-20 stablecoin issued on the Polygon Network, strictly pegged 1:1 to the United States Dollar and issued in full compliance with Swiss legislation. SCB is fully collateralised by cash and cash equivalents, securely held in custody with a Swiss private bank and verified by third-party attestations."
